name: Majyo no Nebaneba Note
storyline:
Our lovely witch Mucos passed by the demon cave and decided to go in there and have a look around.
What is she trying to do? To find buried treasure and earn money? To defeat the demons that live there? Neither, she just wants to look around!
summary: This is a roguelike game that combines cards and dice, where players build card decks and compete for dice points during combat to defeat their enemies.
